name: set status
parse press angle data
subscribe to RMU300 data from master block
parse live spm data
parse stroke mode
func: return msg;

query:
DELETE FROM pph;
COPY pph(asset, job, shifthour, pph) FROM '/home/controls-orin-1/Desktop/pscMasterPPH.csv' DELIMITER ',' CSV HEADER;

name: refresh pph based on csv file once per day
function 1
increment stroke based on press angle

query:
INSERT INTO strokedata (date, asset, shifthour, shift) 
VALUES (NOW() AT TIME ZONE 'America/New_York', 'P04', {{{msg.payload.shifthour}}}, {{{msg.payload.shift}}});

name: send stroke id and timestamp to local db

func: rbe

name: function 2
function 3
Calc hourly eff

query:
INSERT INTO hourlydata(hour, shifthour, efficiency, asset, shift)
VALUES(Now(), {{{msg.payload.shifthour}}},{{{msg.payload.eff}}}, '{{{msg.payload.asset}}}', '{{{msg.payload.current_shift}}}')

name: function 6
function 7

query:
INSERT INTO shiftdata(day, gsph, avg_eff, shift, totaldowntime)
VALUES('{{{msg.payload.day}}}', {{{msg.payload.shift_gsph}}}, {{{msg.payload.avg_eff}}}, '{{{msg.payload.current_shift}}}', INTERVAL '{{{msg.payload.downtime}}}');

name: function 10

function 9
Clear array on start of shift
func:
let parts_array = new Array(8).fill(0);

flow.set('parts_per_hour', parts_array);

name: function 11

query: Select spm, pph from pphdata where shifthour = {{{msg.payload.shifthour}}} AND job = '{{{msg.payload.job}}}';
